implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Defines the REST API endpoint '/tasks' for creating a new task. Receives task data and delegates creation to the TaskService.
implementation.name: create_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
When a POST request is made to '/tasks':
  Receive task data as TaskCreate
  Try to create the task using TaskService
  If successful, return the created task
  If an error occurs, raise HTTP 400 with error details

implementation.name: TaskService.create_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
Log the creation attempt for the user
Call repository.add_task with task_data
Return the result

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles persistence of the new task. Receives validated task data, creates a Task object, stores it, and logs the creation.
implementation.name: TaskRepository.add_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
Create a Task object with a unique ID and the provided data
Append the Task to the in-memory list
Increment the ID counter
Log the creation
Return the Task object
